name: QLPreviewController
desc: A specialized view controller for previewing an item.

items.name: protocol QLPreviewControllerDataSource
items.desc: The data source for a preview controller must adopt this protocol to provide preview items to the controller.

items.name: protocol QLPreviewControllerDelegate
items.desc: The delegate of a preview controller must adopt this protocol.

items.name: class func canPreview(QLPreviewItem) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the preview controller can display an item.

items.name: var currentPreviewItem: QLPreviewItem?
items.desc: The item currently displayed in the Quick Look preview controller.

items.name: var currentPreviewItemIndex: Int
items.desc: The index within the preview item navigation list of the item currently displayed in the Quick Look preview controller.

items.name: func refreshCurrentPreviewItem()
items.desc: Asks the Quick Look preview controller to recompute the display of the current preview item.

items.name: func reloadData()
items.desc: Asks the preview controller to reload its data from its data source.
